charinfo.name: Baki
charinfo.description: A Jounin of the Sand Village, and the leader of Gaara's team; Baki is cruel and ruthless, despite his normally calm nature. Baki fights using both taijutsu and ninjutsu together with top of the line Sand Village branded Flak Jackets.

abilities.name: Sudden Strike
abilities.description: A simple, blindingly fast attack leaving an illusionary trail to throw off enemies. Baki does 20 piercing damage to one enemy.

abilities.name: Wind Blade
abilities.description: Baki conjures a maelstrom of blade-like wind and does 40 piercing damage to one enemy.

abilities.name: Flak Jacket
abilities.description: Baki puts on a specialized flak jacket from the sand village on himself, or one ally granting that character 50 destructible defense for 4 turns and during this time, that character will ignore all non-damage harmful effects except chakra cost changes.

abilities.name: Baki Teleportation
abilities.description: This skill makes Baki invulnerable for 1 turn.
